query.statement: SELECT rownum as rows, ps.cont_no, c.code_name as plan_kind_c, ps.prod_no, p.prod_name, ps.prod_slct_date, ps.prod_rels_date FROM prod_slct_istm ps, cont_base cb, code c, prod_base p WHERE 1=1 and ps.cont_no = cb.cont_no and ps.prod_no = p.prod_no and cb.plan_kind_c = c.code and c.code_type = 'PLAN_KIND_C';
